IndexPage.title: Wedding App - Home Page
IndexPage.description: ¡Bienvenidos al ejemplo de Next.js Internationalization (i18n)! Esta demo muestra la potencia del App Router y cómo gestionar contenido multilingüe sin problemas utilizando next-intl

sections.locationsText1: We therefore have the pleasure to invite you to our wedding ceremony.
sections.locations1: Choose the perfect venue that captures the essence of your love story.
sections.grettingText: There are days in life that are special on their own. Sharing them with the people you love makes them unforgettable.
sections.galleryText: Each photo tells a part of our story, from the simplest moments to the most extraordinary. We feel fortunate to have shared so many memories together and are excited to create many more in the future.

form.warning: We hope to see you at our wedding. You will receive an email with the wedding details, please check the

commentsInput.placeholder: Feel free to add any additional comments that you would like to be considered

example.title: Example of internationalization
example.description: This is an example of how you can manage multilingual content in Next.js using next-intl. You can change the language in the navigation bar.

NotFoundPage.title: Página no encontrada
NotFoundPage.description: ¡Uy! Parece que te has topado con una página que no existe. No te preocupes, nuestra magia de internacionalización sigue trabajando duro en otras partes de la aplicación. Siéntete libre de navegar de vuelta para explorar más

AboutUs.title: About us
AboutUs.description:
A young woman from Priego and a Sayagués lad,
 crossed paths in a distant land.
 What began as a sincere friendship,
 transformed into love, a true passion.

 To grow together, they embraced a dream,
 and to Ireland, their lives they did stream.
 Like tourists in Mallorca, under a calm starry sky,
 in Cala Mendia, they chose to share their love for the rest of their lives.
